name: Harlem Tavern
address: 2153 Frederick Douglass Blvd, New York, NY 10026, USA

reviews.text: Excelente brunch. Personal muy amable. Muy recomendable y precio razonable.

I love this place! They have amazing food! And have any type of flavor you want savory, sweet. They even have desert, my recommendation for the desert would be the cheesecake, the flavor is just right and the texture is soft and moist! Can‚Äôt wait to come back for the 6th time!
Always a good time on football sunday
The host late Saturday evening with funny and entertaining. Will definitely start going again more often.
Great atmosphere, sports playing, music background, good food, great service. Highly recommend

After walking over 30 km's, being a typical tourist, we saw this venue like a mirage. We willed our tired legs to walk the last few hundred metres to the blurry outline of the Harlem Tavern. After touching door we celebrated, as we knew a beer would soon be moistening our lips.

But further good tidings awaited us, as we discovered an awesome selection of food. I sculled my beer üç∫ and scoffed a Turkey Burger in mere seconds.

Fully sated, we were able to make it to the Subway and back to our AirBnB.

5 stars to this wonderful establishment.

Super Resto ambiance NFL!
Burger excellent et accueil tr√®s sympathique.  Super rapport qualit√© prix !
food was good. nice environment.
Not a fan of animals being at a good establishment regardless whether its outside or not

Good space, good music, good food.

I have to give a shout out to Luca who was super hospitable.
Great

Every time I come here I have a great time!!! And tonight once again I was blessed by excellent customer service!!! The bartender Alijah was so welcoming and pleasant; great customer service from this Queen. I appreciate the hospitality; I will definitely be back!!!! Ask for her and tell her King David sent ya!!!!

Here again on a Saturday night & the Bartender Alicia is the bomb!!!! Once again Great customer service!!! And it was a vibe in there as well üî•üî•üî•üî•üî•
Awesome pub in the heart of Harlem. Friendly and welcoming of all. Great food and beer selection.
Had a great time staff were friendly.

Great little neighborhood sports bar. Second time going and I would be back again. The food is good ( the burgers are amazing). The drinks aren‚Äôt water down as well and they have a good selection. They play good music and it‚Äôs at a decent volume which allows you to actually have a conversation with the person you‚Äôre with. Service is a bit non existent when you‚Äôre inside. So it‚Äôs best to find a bar seat. Outside service was great

Stumbled upon this place because I was in the area looking for a good meal. My server was very warm and welcoming. We ordered the lamb burger, steak frites, and seafood gumbo. Everything was delicious!! I‚Äôm so used to spending an obscene amount and being disappointed when I go out to eat but this place did not disappoint in either regard. Steak and burger were cooked perfectly. Gumbo was almost too salty but not enough for me to really care. I live 1.5 hrs away and I‚Äôm already thinking about when I‚Äôll return.

I was excited when I saw Crispy Tofu Sliders. They are actually crispy & the little sauce wow 10/10. Truffle fries delicious ü§§. Bellini not on the menu however was made (bc I asked) with a peach puree. So flippin good! It was beautiful out so I faced the street & I rarely eat outside but so much to see and the people passing.  5 ‚≠êÔ∏è for everything.
Always a great energy when I come here. Food is really good.
Leuke chaos. Lekker druk. No nonsens. Harlem vibes.
Ok

We went out on a Friday summer night. The atmosphere was lacking, we sat outside but didn't get as much vibe as we were getting from the bar across the street that had lve entertainment. For a Friday evening it was lacking. The food was good. The drinks were pretty good. At the end of the evening we shared a virgin strawberry daiquiri, it was AMAZING!  Our server was pleasant and gave perfect recommendations. We shared a variety of dishes and enjoyed.
Top tentje!

Drinks are strong, food is good. It was my first time and I was surprised at the ambiance. It is very much a sports bar which was unexpected (to me) for the area. Made me feel like I was no longer in the city and maybe in LI or NJ üòÖ
Bella esperienza ad Harlem, panino veg buono e sandwich di pollo ottimo, ampia scelta di birre
The hostess was great, and our server was very efficient. Food was excellent.
Bacon burger sliders were SO good!!!

Lemon pepper wings and Habanero wings were good, Calamari was seasoned well and crunchy. Salmon was also good!
Service wasn't good, waited over 20 minutes for anyone to address us.  Once our order was taken the service was a little better.
Atmosphere was great, diverse crowd and a great DJ!
This is baaaaaaaaad ! They didn‚Äôt give me my wings this place is üóëÔ∏è! This place should be removed from the earth itself

The only reason for my 1* is that No business should serve tomatoes if they going to cut them looking like that and add them to a sandwich!!! But the chicken was cooked very good . The server was awesome . But also the bathroom i used was just dirty and this point should've take pics but people will see from themselves

Absolutely Exceptional Service!
‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
We had a fantastic experience:  the place was great, and Carlos went above and beyond to make us feel welcomed and taken care of. His attention to detail and warm hospitality truly stood out. Looking forward to more moments like this.

Highly recommended!
Good Food & Good Drinks Our Waiter's Name Was Darreen HE WAS THE BEST

Went in with high hopes. The band was playing,
Ambiance was nice. Food left A LOT to be desired & wait staff was slow with refills. The prices were good but the garnishes on my salmon burger were not as advertised on the menu, I wanted lunch but was stuck with brunch and my mom‚Äôs chicken was very dry. Wouldn‚Äôt go back üôÅ

The service and atmosphere were great. My best friend who's like a brother to me was having a get-together there with family. I'm not a drinker so all I had was 2 apple martinis before and after dinner. Food was great. Had a great time. Can't until next year.
yoooo the food is great

The food and atmosphere was awesome! We had burgers, I had a delicious lamb burger with truffle fries! Everyone loved their burgers! We had Ginger for our waitress she was great, we had Barbie who brought our food out and was super cool!

Live DJ, amazing food and incredible drinks....win, win!!!!!! I always have an amazing time here!! This is my favorite go-to spot for lunch or dinner when I come to New York. It's always a guaranteed good time! You can enjoy the vibes for hours!!!
Very nice place. The Wait staff was very attentive. Oysters were exceptional.
Been dinning here for years, and it's always a great time never disappoints
best brunch in harlem
Always a great stop with chill vibes. Mixologist Orchid is magnificent!
Good food, good service. Will return
A good spot to catch up a friend.
Accommodating. Great service from our waitress Tai.
The shrimp tacos are too delicious. The staff is friendly and attentive. The drinks were good. Parking can be a little tricky. Overall, it was an amazing experience.
Food was good and the music was great. We did wait over 20 minutes for anyone to come to our table and take our order.
Í¥úÏ∞Æ

Tr√®s chouette d√©couverte! D√©jeuner en terrasse, musique live, formule brunch 19.95$ incluant accompagnement et boisson (parmi un choix de cocktails alcoolis√©s ou de boissons soft). C'est vraiment un spot agr√©able √† d√©couvrir.
Pour les amoureux du sport, les matchs sont diffus√©s!

Their food was good. I had an HT burger n truffle fries, which was delicious, Latisha had the jerk quesadilla, and Robinson had calamari and fish üåÆ.  The service was good. She was caring, making sure we were good and had everything we wanted. When the check came, we told her how much to charge, but she winded up charging $2 extra. Our total was $82.20 she charged $84.20, plus we gave her the 20% tip. She deserved it, but let us give it to you. She seemed to be the only waitress on the floor that I had seen, and it could have been a mistake also...all is forgiven. The atmosphere was a laid-back cool vibe. Music R & B was playing, not loud, just right. We had a great time and will go back again.
Everything was great but I believe our server had too many tables and kinda forgot about us. The drinks were good and my steak was cooked to perfection. I'll definitely be going back

My travel companion and I stopped in on a Saturday afternoon for a quick bite and cocktail while we waited for our reservations at Melba‚Äôs. Thankfully this was just a stop. Had this been the destination I would‚Äôve been incredibly disappointed the establishment being nearly empty the service was terrible.

Bloody Mary 6.5/10
Heavy in the tomato sauce and light on the alcohol. Additionally, there were no additional love or accoutrements to help this beverage taste anything more than like leftovers.

Jerk Chicken 7.5/10

Peach Fuzz 1/10
Do not recommend. My date sent it back. Rather my date tried to send it back but the service was so terrible. We ended up holding onto it for about 25 minutes before anyone came to our table to provide assistance.

Salmon burger 7.75/10

My friend brought me here for my birthday. My first time here. The food was delicious we tried a new item on the menu that was a healthier version of pizza I believe it was called flatbread pizza. It was delicious (& I am picky). I had a chicken sandwich with fries and chicken tenders. Super good. The drinks were great. We had Casamigos margaritas. Will be returning. Our server, Kam was wonderful.

The food and service were awesome. They could handle a party of thirty or more without needing a deposit. I loved the food, drinks, and servers. Everyone was super nice and helpful. The atmosphere was upbeat but not too crazy, which was great for families and kids. There was even live music, and the performers played Sesame Street for my daughter.

Was this place recently renovated? It‚Äôs BEAUTIFUL and so clean. Outstanding food. A drink menu so huge, it was hard to choose. I wanted to try so much stuff. Our server Ramon was phenomenal and extremely attentive. I don‚Äôt want to give‚Ä¶

Harlem Tavern is a vibrant spot in NYC that offers a great mix of atmosphere, food, and drinks. The outdoor seating is spacious, so it‚Äôs great for a sunny day or warm night. They have a solid menu with comfort foods like the Tavern Burger and Buffalo Wings that hit the spot. The drinks selection is great too with plenty of craft beers and cocktails to choose from. Also the staff is super friendly- only did 4 stars because it was so busy, so we had a to wait a bit to put in our requests.

The place was filled with loud sports fans so we sat on the patio. We had the brunch special which included an entr√©e and a drink. We had peach Billings! The price was $19.95 and worth it! Our server was friendly and pleasant.  I think her base was Kiki! I will go ba k again! I had lamb burger cooked to perfection! My son had huevos Ranchos he said it was delicious!

Maybe their night life is better than their day time lunch hours. I called ahead to see if they serve turkey burgers and was happy to hear that they do! I walked in around 2PM and the energy and hospitality was lack luster, as I was told to seat myself wherever. Initially I went to the bar where I was told happy hour does not begin until 4PM and only drinks will be served. So, I find a quiet spot in the corner between the threshold of the bar and dining room. The water glasses are already facing right side up on the table, and visibly dirty. I just asked for a clean glass, no problem. I‚Äôll take partial responsibility for the fact that I was served a turkey burger with pork bacon on it. I ordered blindly without reading the menu, but I feel as though I should‚Äôve been informed by my knowledgeable waitress. Regardless, I sent it back knowing they were just going to remove the bacon from my burger and reassemble it accordingly. To my dismay, my burger comes back with a hair on the plate. Mind you, it‚Äôs only 2PM. I‚Äôm sure it wasn‚Äôt intentional but at this point the cleanliness of this establishment is a cause for concern.

In the end my meal was compensated, and I was no longer planning to leave this review due to  their effort to rectify the situation. However, the opportunity presented itself when I was notified to leave a reviewüòÖ

I've gone to the tavern for years since they arrived to harlem. It  fluctuates, they're on a high note!. The hostess were super friendly and got the perfect seat for me outside but can still feel the A/C. My server Sam was awesome and super patient. THE Flatbread is really insane!! So delicious..every flavor balanced. The sangria was refreshing and perfect for the heat. The Buffalo chicken wrap was no good, the chicken tasted like it was fried hard and then just sat. I was able to switch to the fish sandwich, that was perfect!

Great atmosphere and casual American dining. Fun place to hang out. Multiple screens if you like that. Food is good for typical fare but challenging for gluten free diets. But this isn‚Äôt that kind of place. No pretense. Just about having good vibes.

I've been here about six times over the last two years. Their lunch and dinner fare is leagues above their breakfast and lunch fare. Great service, inclusive establishment. Strong drinks. Photos are from my most recent visit a week ago.

we live in the neighborhood so we come here often for the convenience and for the outdoor seating on nice days. with that being said, whether busy or not, it‚Äôs like pulling teeth to get decent/timely service. (the kitchen is very fast though whenever the order is finally taken and put in)

today we had:

cheeseburger sliders- tasty but a bit dry and nothing to write home about.

pot of mussels with white wine sauce. these were great! would order again and try the other sauces even though the white wine was fine

caesar salad- super basic, chicken was on the tougher side and was missing the anchovies.

side note: the lamb burger is still the best thing we‚Äôve eaten here.

Adresse √† recommander !
Tr√®s bon d√©jeuner au soleil entre amis √† la terrasse du Harlem Tavern ce 24 avril 2024.
Assiettes copieuses, burgers d√©licieux, service parfait, personnel bien agr√©able.
Total pour 4 personnes : $150 (dont une bouteille de vin √† $44, et tips $23).

Recommended address!
Great lunch in the sun with friends on the Harlem Tavern terrace on April 24, 2024.
Hearty plates, delicious burgers, perfect service, pleasant staff.
Total for 4 people: $150 (including a bottle of wine at $44, and tips at $23).

Have a wonderful lunch experience at Harlem Tavern. The food was ready in about 10 minutes and was delicious. They have several screens showing sports games.
Staff were very accommodating as we had children with us.

Came through this past Sunday and had a great time for my first time here. Came during brunch time and the seafood gumbo was delicious. The chicken quesadilla was tasty as well with the steak and eggs. In addition, for brunch time it comes with different selection of drinks you can choose with your meal. I will definitely come back.

This is a busy local hot spot. My visit was on a Sunday during brunch. Tables were available but we opted for the bar to be away from the crowds. The Shocktop beer on draft was cold and delicious. I highly recommend the pot of mussels in spicy tomato sauce.  It is served with garlic bread to soak up that great broth. Aside from that, we ordered fries, chicken, and waffles, which were all great as well.

Looking forward to returning soon.

Food is definitely overpriced but the burgers and fries were very filling and delicious. I went for a late lunch so there weren't too many people. The vibe was nice and the music wasn't too loud. They have a lunch menu that is a little cheaper than their dinner menu.

Even though there are a lot of servers, the service is really slow. I saw a group of servers just chatting and being on their phones in front of the kitchen when I passed by them on my way to the bathroom. Overall, good food but definitely not a place to eat at unless you have no other plans after.

I had such a wonderful experience here. The food and drinks were amazing! I had the braised beef sliders with truffle fries and fish tacos, also washed it down with a Frozen Banana flavored Margarita. Delish! Will definitely be coming back.
Great music, excellent food. One of my favorites in the area.

Harlem Tavern c'est un restaurant sympa et d√©contract√©. S'il fait beau c'est agr√©able de prendre son repas √† l'ext√©rieur avec des musiciens qui mettent de l'ambiance. Nous avons go√ªt√© le burger et la salade aux crevettes c'√©tait bon. Nous avons pass√© un bon moment.

Went with out of town guests Memorial Day weekend.  Food was good and service was excellent. But the music was so loud it was almost impossible to have conversations. I asked the waiter if it could be turned down just a bit.  He shrugged and said the volume was up to the deejay.

Don‚Äôt let the good photo fool you. Although the waitress was very and provided me with options for my wings, the wings itself were dry! Covered in sauce on the outside but when you take a bite it‚Äôs all dry.

Went during happy hour but ended up ordering drinks outside of the happy hour menu due to limitations on drink types. Food was actually really good but seems all food in Harlem hits so far! Just keep in mind it's gonna be pricey whenever in Manhattan.

We went on a busy Friday night and enjoyed our visit! Service was good even with how busy it was. The happy hour drinks were on point and we enjoyed the burgers and jerk chicken quesadillas, and buffalo wings appetizer. A great spot for a weekend night

Let‚Äôs keep it short and sweet.

Happy Hour is now 4-7 despite a sign saying 4-9pm.
Buffalo wings are not buffalo. Tastes like hot sauce and  a touch of sugar. What buffalo sauce is sweet? The wings are not crispy. They‚Äôre like pre-cooked then reheated with sauce. Definitely not freshly fried. This is sad because wings are so simple.

Fried calamari was mediocre and not flavorful. It‚Äôs missing something and poorly breaded. They brought it out 2 mins after we ordered so maybe it‚Äôs from a box tbh.

Short rib was pretty good. Potatoes were good and the rib was tender. It needed a little more spice though, it depended too much on the sweet sauce.

Service was okay, maybe a little rushed because it‚Äôs so busy. They‚Äôre definitely understaffed.

$75 including tip for 1 appetizer, 1 entree, 2 drinks. Definitely not worth it. I do not understand how their drinks are $14 in this area‚Äîwe are not way downtown.

It was too early for the music to be blasting the way it was. This is NOT the place to have a conversation. Great place to go by yourself for the loud atmosphere if thays you‚Äôre thing and watch the game.
Place was great tons of drinks and plates it a definitely must stop by

We hit this place up to grab a drink after dinner and before heading to a show, so it was a bit of a rush, but this place is a vibe!

The drinks were strong and reasonably priced.

Some girls behind us ordered some chicken wings, and they looked fire.

Will definitely have to visit in the future to get a more complete experience.

Nice place to have a quick bite. Upon entry no one was available to offer seating. 10 minutes later I decided to walk to the bar and seat myself (reason for 3 stars). The bartender was more engaged in his phone then service. No eye to eye‚Ä¶

Stopped by for quick dinner. The waiter seemed a little disinterested but it was later in the evening... The spinach dip was excellent! Creamy & cheesy but not too dense, pitas bread was garlicky and not oily which was a perfect pairing. Drinks were delicious, we had the white sangria. my only gripe was my cup had a gnat in it and some other mysterious floaties which were very off putting but after I got a new glass I didn't see anything else so I was fine. I ordered some sides as well, mash was standard but good flavor. The green beans were a little bland, not much flavor and crunchy. I guess I like my green beans cooked a little more. The people I came with enjoyed their entrees (burgers) and overall it was a pleasant experience. I would return if ever in town again.

Our server was Bianca, she was great!

Solid food, such a vibe with the live music and the energy in the place. I recommend!

Mac and cheese is delicious! Tasty appetizers! Get there between 4 and 7pm for Happy Hour. Dj is usually there by 8pm spinning good tunes on Fridays and Saturdays. Good place to chill, have a drink, get some good eats or watch a game. Customer service is always good!!!!
